QuestData.Title: Goodnight, Gronn
QuestData.Description: I've outdone myself again. I've fashioned a sleeping powder for you to use on Grulloc, the gronn I spoke of who is guarding what I want.$B$BGrulloc keeps himself at the Cursed Hollow, an area at the eastern edge of Dragons' End on the other side of the Circle of Blood.$B$BIf I were you, I wouldn't tarry long once you have his sack. The effects of the dust won't last long.
QuestData.CompletionText: You are before me again, $c. This must mean that you've procured the sack out from underneath Grulloc's nose.
QuestData.RewardText: <Baron Sablemane peers inside the gronn's sack and seems satisfied.>$B$BVery well, you have upheld your end of the bargain. And now, I will gift your Commander Stonewall with the trap.
